t1['Year_Start'] = t1['Date'].apply(lambda y: y.split(", ")[1].split(" ")[0].strip())
t1['Year_End'] = t1['Date'].apply(lambda y: y.split(", ")[-1].strip())

source.68343c6d:
Q1 = """
select 
    Tournament_Name as TI, 
    cast(Total_Prize as integer) as Prize_Pool, 
    First_Place, 
    Second_Place
from t1
where TI like 'The International%'
"""

psql.sqldf(Q1)
source.4b9f650f: Converting Total Prize to numerical value
source.fb66f857:
Data Cleaning

Since the structure of t1 and t2 dataframe is the same, I will be showing some of the data cleaning process using t1 as an example. Of course, the same technique can be used for t2 as well.
